pullrequest.title: More gazebo math deprecations in entities and joints

content.html:
I'm doing some detective work here and I found that a long time ago, the Joint class had a pure virtual GetAxis function:

#!/osrf/gazebo/src/432bd11781fe6cb83bfc7b9830ef913ff95e1000/src/physics/Joint.hh?at=dev&fileviewer=file-view-default#Joint.hh-103

My current theory is that once that was removed, we forgot to remove these ones which this pull request would remove. Still looking for when Joint::GetAxis disappears.
